briefdescription.para: Sets the LoRa radio to receive mode.
Sets the LoRa radio to transmit mode.
Sets the radio to transmit mode, sends a message string using the LoRa radio and sets the radio back to receive mode.
Encrypts a message (character array) using the AES256 algorythm with the corresponding node key The encryption is made by encrypting blocks of 16 bytes and joining them together.

simplesect.para: byte* a byte array containing the encrypted message

briefdescription.para: Decrypts a message string using the AES256 algorythm with the corresponding node key.

simplesect.para: char* an array of characters containing the decrypted message

briefdescription.para: returns the minimum value between two integers

simplesect.para: int the smaller between a and b

briefdescription.para: Send an acknowledge message confirming the reception of an uplink transmission.

parameterdescription.para: ID of the message being acknowledged

briefdescription.para: Send a status request message asking for a specific node to respond with a status update.
Send a control message to set a value for a node's actuator.

parameterdescription.para: ID of the actuator to control
Value to set the actuator to

briefdescription.para: Get a message from the send queue and send it. Implements retransmission in case an acknowledge message is not received. Aware of a failed transmission.

parameterdescription.para: current time in millisenconds since boot

briefdescription.para: Get a message from the relay queue and send it to the server via serial communication.

parameterdescription.para: current time in millisenconds since boot

briefdescription.para: Builds a json string containg the message information and adds the string to the relay queue.

parameterdescription.para: payload structure containing the message information along with RSSI, SNR and battery voltage

briefdescription.para: Relays the downlink messages received from the server to the corresponding node. Formats the message into a compact form.

parameterdescription.para: character array containing the downlink message to be relayed

briefdescription.para: Called every time a new message is received. Filters unwanted messages, decrypts the payload, gets the relevant fields from the payload and sends back an acknowledge message if necessary. Finally, calls constructJsonAndAddToQueue to build a json message destined for the server.

parameterdescription.para: size of the incoming message in bytes

briefdescription.para: Communication Protocol library - set of functions and data structures used to build a network using the LoRa modulation radios.
